title: Books for all
brief_description: Shows the eagerness of third world people to learn reading and writing. Presents the progress, with the assistance of UNESCO, of the Delhi Free Library, showing its children’s story hour, its veranda ‘reading room’, its touring book van, and other facilities. Urges that all people should consider the illiteracy of half the world’s population their problem.
